attributes.action: Give supporter's of football club's in administration first option to buy their clubs
attributes.additional_details:
This petitions proposes that supporter's of all British football club's, if their club enters administration, should be given the first option to buy their club from administrators - via Fan Ownership vehicles, in association with Supporters Direct.

Give your club the best chance to survive and exit administration, should the situation arise, and sign this petition.

Coventry City, Leeds United and Rangers are just three who are still suffering from administration. All three clubs have been passed on to people who do not have the clubs best interests at heart.

Portsmouth and Hearts, recently, managed to save their clubs, but in the case of Portsmouth, they had to wait a long time and suffer many difficulties.

All supporters of all clubs will benefit from a law to protect football clubs. Fan ownership is sustainable, as being shown by Swansea City, Portsmouth, Hearts, Clyde and others.

British football clubs need you.
